resources.string: Migrating data to the new app version...
Your location is not detected yet
The map has not been loaded yet. Check your internet connection.
Skill requires GPS access to work correctly. \nPlease, enable GPS services for Skill app on your device.
You probably have poor internet connection, so we can\'t connect with our server
You don\'t have friends that \nyou track in the current resort
We are trying to detect a resort
Internet connection is not available or unreliable. When it restores your friends show up here

Tracking is not available
outside a resort zone!
We cannot track your friends!Please turn GPS on. More info
Become PRO to track friends on the map

Tracking is not available!
Give Skill permission to track your GPS location. To Settings
Internet connection is not available or very unstable, please try again later
The weight must be in range from %s to %s kgs
The weight must be in range from %s to %s lbs
This nickname is already taken by another user
Only one hyphen in a row is allowed
Dot at the end is not allowed
Only numbers, Latin letters and symbols "-", "_", "." are allowed
Nickname cannot be shorter than %d characters
Nickname cannot be longer than %d characters
This email is already taken by another user
Password cannot be shorter than %d characters
We couldn\'t find Google Play on your device, so Skill may not work properly.
Sorry, you already bought all available coupons
Sorry, all coupons have been sold
Sorry, store is not available in your region for now

Store is available in the following countries:

 - Russia

We're actively working on supporting Store in other countries. Potential partners are welcome to submit a proposal to info@getfullstack.co
Sorry, you already bought all available raffle tickets
Sorry, all raffle tickets have been sold
We will send you further details (date and method of receiving the prize) to %s within 3 days from the date of the draw
Sorry, you already bought all coupons/raffle tickets available per user
Sorry, no more offers are available
Not enough coins to buy the coupon/raffle ticket
Please, provide your email so we can contact you if you win the raffle
If you press OK, %1$d coin(s) will be deducted from you balance. Confirm?
If you press OK, %1$d coin(s) will be deducted from you balance. Confirm?
Show this code to receive the goods on the coupon.
Couldn\'t load the image, please try again
You haven\'t recorded any trips yet.
It seems that app was closed by operation system.\nPlease, make sure the settings are correct.
All events for the current session in this resort (%1$s) will disappear if you don\'t record any tracks
Please provide your weight so we can calculate calories
There are no events that can be shown on the map for that day
Poor GPS is happening too long already
You are %s in the overall ranking
You are %s in the overall ranking on
You are %s in the ranking for %s
You are %s in the ranking for %s on
You don\'t have tracks on this piste yet
Now you can choose a sport in Skill
You can change your sport later
What sport should be applied to the recorded tracks?
Later, you can change the sport for a specific track
track your friends on the map
Statistics will be shown for the selected sport(s)
Statistics is not calculated yet. Please come back later.
User has no friends with that name
Send an invite to your friends to unlock the full potential of Skill!
You can track a friend when both of you are in the same resort
Email/nickname or password is invalid. Please try again or use Forgot Password option.
You already registered in Skill via %1$s, tap %1$s icon to enter.
You already registered in Skill as %1$s. To enter use %1$s as a nickname and provide your password.
There is no registered %s account. In order to log in, you need to register your account in Skill. Continue registration?
Looks like you\'ve stopped.\nWant to finish the track now?
Sorry, we can\'t delete the track now because Skill is synchronizing data with the server. Please try again in a few minutes.
You\'re out of a resort zone right now.\nHope to see you on slopes soon!
You didn\'t ski today.\nHope to see you on slopes soon!
Happy to see you on a mountain! Skill detects activity automatically, you don\'t need to press any button!
Still not on a mountain?\nHurry up!
You still have a time to take several rides today!\nHurry up!
As soon as you start a ride Skill will record your activity automatically!

ATM Skill is receiving GPS locations with poor accuracy. It should be fine soon.
The following may help:
1. Start moving
2. Go outside
Please enable GPS on the device.
Please register to perform this operation
You can change your sport later
You can change your sport later
I confirm that I have read and agree to the License Terms and Privacy Policy.
Already have an account? Tap here to sign in
You have already registered via %s, please go to the login screen and tap %1$s button to sing in
You don\'t see yourself in rating because your profile data is accessible by friends only.
Your friend\'s profile is private for this rating, so the rank is not available
We couldn\'t calculate your rank. Most probably you don\'t have tracks, or your tracks are not accounted in the rating yet
We couldn\'t calculate your friend\'s rank. Most probably your friend\'s tracks are not accounted in the rating yet
You don\'t have tracks for the selected time period
You\'re in an anonymous mode. Please register to see your rank
No results found for this period
Rating will be shown for the selected sport(s)

Max speeds greater than %s are moderated by Mountain Patrol. \n\nMax speed is provided by GPS sensor. Due to various reasons (for instance bad weather conditions) GPS may provide incorrect max speed values. Mountain Patrol validates that you could achieve such high speed indeed. The validation may take up to 10 days.
We don\'t have any pistes for this resort!
The request to add pistes has been sent. Thanks!
Your profile (statistics, trips, friends) is accessible by other Skill users.
Your profile (statistics, trips) will be accessible by friends only. Also you can\'t participate in global and resort ratings.
Deserialization error. Check your input data.
Send notifications about new coupons/products in Store
%s: send request to remove your account?

After the request is completed your account in Skill will be deactivated and can\'t be restored. All records about your activities, rates and other data will be deleted.\n\nYou can get the request status via the URL that will be provided after you confirm the action.
Your account and data will be deleted.
%s\n\nPlease copy the link! You can use the link to observe the status of the account deletion
It\'s a private profile. Only friends can access it.
Opps, error occurred on the client
Opps, error occurred on the server
Something went wrong, please try again
Our servers are busy at the moment. Please try later.
Failed to load the image. It may be wrong file format or the image is broken.
The billing service is unavailable. Probably it\'s because you do not have Google Play or you are not signed in Google account.
You have unsynchronized data for user %s
To synchronize it you have to sign in to %s account again. Skill will sync the data as soon as the internet connection is reliable. \nSign in OR clear the unsynchronized data?
You recorded tracks as anonymous user
Delete or combine it with %s tracks?
Please give us your email so we can contact you.
Happy to hear any feedback, be it positive or negative!
If you need any help, fell free to write us
Sorry, current app version is no longer supported.\nPlease update the app.
You can\'t close a trip without tracks
Are you sure you want to close the current trip?
If you delete the trip we can\'t restore it later. Please confirm that you want to proceed?
Sorry, active trip can\'t be deleted while you\'re in a resort
Are you sure you want to close the current trip?
Do you really want to delete this event?
Do you really want to delete this track?
Failed to download photo from iCloud
It seems you registered via %1$s. Please try sign in with %1$s
User with such email/nickname doesn\'t exist.
Success! You should get an email with instructions how to restore access to the account.
Do you have problems with password reset?
Reset password link is invalid, it misses some required parameters.
Skill doesn\'t know how to handle %s. Please ensure that the link is correct.
To reset the password you must logout
Please give Skill permission to track your GPS location.

Open the app in a resort &
Skill will automatically:
Power-saving mode is active. GPS is disabled in this mode, so Skill can\'t record your activity.
Power-saving mode is active. GPS is disabled in this mode, so Skill can\'t record your activity.
Sorry, we didn\'t find an app to open this URL. Download/enable the browser or open the URL in some other way yourself.
We couldn\'t detect any active subscription for your profile. Please contact our support if you think it\'s wrong.
Your Pro status has been restored until %@!
Perfect if you make 1-2 trips a season
If you are in love in mountains
We couldn\'t verify your purchase in AppStore, so your subscription active until %s. We will try again soon!
Check your place in the resort rating and globally among all Skill users
Check your place in the rating on your favorite piste
Check your place in the rating on your favorite trail
Curious how much calories have you burned riding all day?
Track your friends on the resort map and check theirs activity status **
Statistics for your trips for a season and overall.

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the same price. You can manage your subscription in Account Settings.
Recurring payment. Cancellation is possible at any time.
Sorry, we couldn\'t confirm the payment. Please contact support (Profile - Settings) if you believe it\'s a mistake.
- Available in a resort zone only;
- You can track friends even if they don\'t have PRO version.
To be notified of new chat messages.
Track your friends in a resort
We noticed, that Skill doesn\'t work well in the background (when device screen is off) on your device. Please make sure that you allowed Skill to work in the background. Open the instruction
For the changes to take the effect, please restart the application.
Skill needs your help to work correctly:
1. In settings turn the toggle off
2. In popup window ensure all toggles are on
2. Choose "Background Settings" in the popup window

Sorry, we couldn\'t open the screen to configure background work settings on your device. Please try to find background work settings yourself, otherwise there is a chance that Skill will be unstable in background or won\'t work at all.
Friend request has been sent to user %s
Join me in Skill! You can record runs, track your friends activity online on the resort map, compete on various ratings, and much more. %s
Are you sure you want to delete this message?
The theme has been saved! Please restart the application to see the changes
